text: Hey Ryan, is this issue resolved for you now?

Hey Sejal, i ended up just taking the component outside of the component folder and just having everything in one folder.

It works now but not sure why it wouldn't work before when it was in its own component folder. The name and path were correct as it displayed in Dev Mode but it just wouldn't build.

`[HubSpot.extend]: We were unable to connect to the UI Extensions Dev Server`

I'm guessing this console notice when I load my ui-extension is unrelated to my project and is a HubSpot issue?
I was trying to figure out why only one runServerless function is completing. The 2 that aren't completing use GraphQL funny enough.
Only happens when I'm not running it via local development. It happens when I run `hs project upload` and `hs project dev` isn't running.
Secret issue maybe? This runs off of private app token only though
Can you please help me understand your file structure before you fixed it and after?

> It works now but not sure why it wouldn't work before when it was in its own component folder.
This should work ideally
